Domestic Animals

Domestic Animals in Zoo Education

Domestic animals are species generally adapted and live alogside humans,relying on them for food and shelter.
These animals animals are generally tame and kept at homes and in the Zoos for children entertainment.
Common examples include dogs,cats,sheeps and horses.

Character and Classification

Adaptation:
Unlike tamed wild animals,they have changed in behaviour to suit human environments.Some exampls are ;
dogs,cats,cats,cows,sheep,pigs,horses,donkeys and chickens.

Purposes

Domesticated,refers to the long-term genetic,evolutionary change,whereas tamed refers to an animal's behavior towards humans.

Why Domestic Animals are great
  • Pets
  • Dogs
  • Livestock
  • Chicken
  • Working
  • Camels
Usefulness
  1. Dogs for pets
  2. Chicken for livestock
  3. Camels forworking
